content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has reached the Supreme Commander, whose only the topic was energy.

The head of statewroteTelegram.

“All reports are devoted to the elimination of the consequences of Russian criminal shelling. Kharkiv and region, Zaporizhzhia, Dnipro, Khmelnitsky and region, Kryvyi Rih, Sumy region, Poltava, Odessa, Vinnytsia, Frankivshchyna and all the affected cities and communities, ”the message reads.

In particular, Volodymyr Zelenskyy heard reports on the course of renewable work, connection of houses to light, water and heat. Also about providing people with temporary housing and all necessary assistance.

The Chairman of the Board of Ukrenergo Volodymyr Kudrytsky and Naftogaz Alexey Chernyshov reported on the state of the power system and the priority steps to strengthen and further defense, commander -in -chief of the Armed Forces Alexander Sirsky and Commander of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces Mykola Oleshchuk - about the work of air defense in these two difficult days.

“The rate made some closed decisions. But to truly protect Ukraine can only give our partners a lot of modern air defense systems. We work daily and in this direction, ”he added.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 22, enemyDrewcombined rocket and aviation strike on the objects of critical infrastructure of Ukraine. Anti -air combat destroyed 92 air targets. The blows damaged the energy infrastructure, housing, civilian facilities in 15 regions.
title: President on the rate: To protect Ukraine can only make partners' decisions to provide air defense systems
description: The head of state wrote about it on Telegram. “All reports are devoted to the elimination of consequences ...
author: Army Inform
